_header: O Christ Jesu meekly I pray to thee
Subjects: prayers, to Christ; Christ, prayers to; prayers, against peril
_description: A prayer to Christ against perils — three stanzas rhyme royal

CULFf16.First Lines:
O Cryste Ihesu mekely I pray to theTo lete thy name wedyr y ryde or
                    gone…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…That thow me saue from eternall schameThat haue full feght
                    & hole truste in þi name
